issue.title: [Python] Expose Arrow's file and memory map classes as NativeFile subclasses
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-441](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-441). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This will give Python users access to more efficient IO pipelines
